episodes.title: Episode 34: From Polygamy to Possibility: Escaping A Cult & Rebuilding From Zero with Calvin Wayman
episodes.description: In this mind-blowing episode, I sit down with Calvin Wayman, host of Cultured Boy, who grew up in a fundamentalist Mormon cult with 4 moms, 1 dad, and 44 siblings. At 30, he made the terrifying choice to leave everything behind—his family, marriage, and entire belief system—to chase a life that felt true to him. We dive into: ✨ The one philosophy class that shattered his reality ✨ How travel & plant medicine helped him reconnect to himself ✨ The wild journey of rebuilding from zero in NYC This episode is all about courage, curiosity, and breaking free. Tune in now & tell us: Have you ever questioned everything you thought you knew? 👀 00:00 Introduction to Amanda Fest Podcast 00:11 Guest's Background: From Fundamentalist Mormonism to Entrepreneurship 00:56 The Journey of Self-Discovery and Leaving the Cult 01:12 Settling in New York and Starting Cultured Boy Podcast 01:41 Meditation and Grounding Exercise 03:39 Discussion on Living Your Dream Life 04:03 Exploring the Concept of Predetermined Paths 07:54 Philosophical Insights: Plato's Allegory of the Cave 15:10 The Realization and Questioning of Core Beliefs 25:01 The Decision to Leave and Its Aftermath 38:35 Reprogramming Beliefs and the Role of Plant Medicine 46:12 Following the Ants: A Journey of Acceptance 47:05 Childhood Memories and Self-Discovery 49:27 Curiosity as a Guiding Principle 52:40 Leaving the Cult: A New Beginning 56:41 Embracing New York City 01:02:40 Manifesting Dreams and Taking Action 01:10:55 The Power of Authenticity and Aligned Action 01:23:26 Conclusion and Reflections ___ Connect w/ me on IG + TikTok @amandalaurena & @amandafestpodcast Connect w/ Calvin on IG @ calvinwayman Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@officialcalvinwayman
